bibl.title: Egypt and the Great Silk Road. Avéc résumé en anglais.
Europe, Hellas and Egypt: Complementary Antipodes during Late Antiquity. Papers from Session IV.3, Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Eighth Annual Meeting in Thessaloniki 2002
bibl.author: SHERKOVA, Tatjana A.

bibl.note: A picture of the spread of small Egyptian objects (faience, terracotta and bronze figurines) along the Silk Road to China.
SHERKOVA Tatjana A., Egypt and the Great Silk Road. Avéc résumé en anglais.

Amanda-Alice MARAVELIA (Ed.), Europe, Hellas and Egypt: Complementary Antipodes during Late Antiquity. Papers from Session IV.3, Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Eighth Annual Meeting in Thessaloniki 2002 = BAR International Series. 1218 (Oxford, 2004) pp. 89-92, 7 figg.
